channel.title: [PI] 317 Adding Crowns to right click menu
channel.description:
Hi people, so i want to add a crown to the right click menu for staff and i'm a little stuck but i have half of it done (i think) my code so far (i have loyalty titles): [code]s = modIcons[2] + "@" + rightClickColor(player.skill) + "@" + getRank(player.skill) + "@whi@" + player.name + combatDiffColor(myPlayer.combatLevel, player.combatLevel) + " (level-" + player.combatLevel + ")";[/code]
and it comes out like this... [img]http://i.imgur.com/lroJmgn.png[/img]
I'm pretty sure the part i'm missing is the .drawSprite and maybe something else... If anyone can help out, that would be great

item.title: [PI] 317 Adding Crowns to right click menu
item.dc:creator: @uncalled_for uncalled for
item.description:
@uncalled_for wrote:

Hi people,
so i want to add a crown to the right click menu for staff and i’m a little stuck but i have half of it done (i think)
my code so far (i have loyalty titles):

s = modIcons[2] + "@" + rightClickColor(player.skill) + "@" + getRank(player.skill) + "@whi@" + player.name + combatDiffColor(myPlayer.combatLevel, player.combatLevel) + " (level-" + player.combatLevel + ")";

and it comes out like this…

I’m pretty sure the part i’m missing is the .drawSprite and maybe something else…
If anyone can help out, that would be great
